message.body: Okay so actually ix-nay on yoga tonight, I'm exhausted and just need to get to bed early...Friday for sure though!
Here is my dilemma: I'm running the rock n roll half on Saturday. I really want to go to yoga on Friday but I'm going to play it by ear. I'll keep you posted!!
Look at you, rock star!! Definitely no pressure if you want to rest on Friday, I'll be there either way :-)
